attributes.action: Require a minimum EPC rating be achieved before installing a heat pump.
attributes.additional_details: Decarbonisation of heating systems is crucial. But the cost of running this technology in inefficient buildings will cause homeowners to reject the technology.
attributes.background: Heat pumps are ineffective and inefficient when installed in inefficient properties. Discuss the implementation of a minimum EPC rating being achieved for a property when installing a heatpump. Make an allowance to ensure that a heatpump can be installed at the same time as other measures.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual property owners.

We could accept a petition calling for a minimum EPC standard for any Government subsidies or grants for heat pumps, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
